thread.title: SXSW 2017: Kesha, Krist Novoselic, John Cena, Bob Odenkirk, More Speakers Announced
thread.title_full: SXSW 2017: Kesha, Krist Novoselic, John Cena, Bob Odenkirk, More Speakers Announced

author: Evan Minsker
title: SXSW 2017: Kesha, Krist Novoselic, John Cena, Bob Odenkirk, More Speakers Announced
text:
49 mins ago SXSW 2017: Kesha, Krist Novoselic, John Cena, Bob Odenkirk, More Speakers Announced Buzz Aldrin, the cast of “Veep,” Seth Rogen, Mick Fleetwood, and Sen. Cory Booker will also be in Austin Photos by Frazer Harrison/Getty Images for Coachella, Valerie Macon/Getty Images, Andrew Toth/Getty Images for Rock Paper Photo 
SXSW 2017 has announced the latest batch of featured speakers. Kesha, Nirvana’s Krist Novoselic, Julia Louis-Dreyfus and the cast of “Veep,” Bob Odenkirk, Mick Fleetwood, Buzz Aldrin, John Cena, Seth Rogen, Sen. Cory Booker, Cindy Wilson (of the B-52’s), Planned Parenthood president Cecile Richards, GLAAD president Sarah Kate Ellis, Sammy Hagar, Frank Oz, CNN’s Jake Tapper, and more will appear in Austin. They join previously announced speakers Nile Rodgers, Lee Daniels, Zane Lowe, Jill Soloway, and FBI director James Comey . Find more information here . SXSW recently added 500 artists to the lineup .
